Class League

java.lang.Object
League.League
public class League extends Object
Acts the core domain object in this application, represents the League, associated with teams, players, matches, coaches, referees, unaffiliated players, and team managers

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    League(ArrayList<Team> teams, ArrayList<Match> matches, ArrayList<Player> players, ArrayList<Coach> coaches, ArrayList<Referee> referees, ArrayList<Player> unaffiliatedPlayers, ArrayList<TeamManager> teamManagers)
    Constructs a League object with teams, matches, players etc.

  • Constructor Details

    • League

      public League(ArrayList<Team> teams, ArrayList<Match> matches, ArrayList<Player> players, ArrayList<Coach> coaches, ArrayList<Referee> referees, ArrayList<Player> unaffiliatedPlayers, ArrayList<TeamManager> teamManagers)
      Constructs a League object with teams, matches, players etc. recieved from the text file in the Data class
      Parameters:
      teams - , the teams in the league
      matches - , matches recorded between the league's in the current season
      players - , the players assigned to the teams in the league
      coaches - , the coaches that coach the players, assinged to a team
      referees - , referees in the league
      unaffiliated - players, players with no team in the league
      team - managers, team managers that manage a single team present in the league

  • Method Details

    • getLeagueStatistics

      public String getLeagueStatistics()
      This method is responsible for calculating and returning a detailed string containing certain statistics of the League like top scorer, total goals scored etc.
      Returns:
      a formatted string with detailed information about the League's statistics
